title: Engineered hole-free, spacer-free dye-sensitized light harvesters for indoor photovoltaic and self-powered applications
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, 2,2839-2843
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00434E, Communication
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Andrew Simon George, Sourava Chandra Pradhan, K. N. Narayanan Unni, Suraj Soman
We have custom-engineered dye-sensitized solar cells (DSCs) by eliminating spacers and holes, fabricating hole-free, spacer-free (HF-SF) DSCs with a 96% active area to total area ratio.
